font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 短暂的： existing or lasting only a short time; short-lived or temporary
【例】 most of life’s joys are transitory 尘世间的欢乐都是过眼烟云，转瞬即逝
【近】 transient, ephemeral, evanescent, fleeting, temporary
【反】 ceaseless, dateless, deathless, endless, enduring, eternal, everlasting, immortal, lasting, long-lived, permanent, perpetual, timeless, undying, unending

【记】 同transient
